pr_title: Wip/6.0 Fix HashMap constructor with expected size usage error

timeline.message: fix HashMap constructor with expected size usage error
fix HashMap constructor with expected size usage error

timeline.body:
There is a bug in old implementation. Different than `HashMap` or `HashSet`, `ConcurrentHashMap` will perform sizing computation internally so we don't need to compute on top of that.
![Screen Shot 2020-03-01 at 3 31 38 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8211458/75633308-c8993e00-5bd1-11ea-996f-a4592e70419d.png)

timeline.body: No need to use the util method in CollectionHelper for `ConcurrentHashMap` constructor is enough for it will compute the size internally.
